Game.Overview: The Jak and Daxter Collection™ features all three best-selling PlayStation®2 classic hits: Jak and Daxter: The Precursor Legacy™, Jak II™ and Jak 3™. This collection follows fan-favorite Jak and his sidekick Daxter through a series of action-packed adventures. The Jak and Daxter Collection™ blends action, shooting, driving, and platforming into one complete package.
